subject: Add OneSignal script tags and service worker files
body:
Updates OneSignal integration to use the official SDK approach with
script tags in HTML head and service worker file.

Changes:
- Add custom web/index.html with OneSignal script tags
- Add public/OneSignalSDKWorker.js service worker file
- Update services/onesignal.ts to use global OneSignal object
- Remove dependency on react-onesignal package

Implementation:
- OneSignal SDK loaded via CDN script tag in HTML head
- Service worker file required by OneSignal in public directory
- TypeScript wrappers provide type-safe access to global OneSignal
- Proper async initialization with timeout handling

This follows OneSignal's official web integration guide and ensures
notifications work correctly on all web browsers.
title: Add OneSignal script tags and service worker files
